title: Question on PROJECT Blueprints
body: If we don't get the Project cores to upgrade all the icons what happens to the blueprints after Project cores are unavailable. Will they disappear from our inventory or will we be able to disenchant them?

replies.body: Per our [project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide, materials will stay in your inventory after the event ends.  You may also be able to disenchant them for essences!  Make sure to check out the guide for full details about the project event.  Hope that helps!
